00019 #include <qwidget.h>
00020 #include <qlayout.h>
00021 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00022 #include <qtextbrowser.h>
00023 #include <qstringlist.h>
00024 #include <qmime.h>
00025 #include <qlabel.h>
00026 #include <qevent.h>
00027 
00028 #include "config.h"
00029 #include "helpTab.h"
00030 #include "globalGoBackLabel.h"
00031 
00032 HelpTab::HelpTab(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00033     : QWidget(parent,name)
00034 {
00035     main.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 0, -1, "helpTab::main.vBoxLayout");
00036     main.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00037     main.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00038     
00039     main.labelLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.vBoxLayout, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight, -1,
00040                     "helpTab::main.labelLayout");
00041     
00042     main.topLabel = new GlobalGoBackLabel(this, "helpTab::main.topLabel");
00043     connect(main.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHome()));
00044     
00045     main.helpContentsButton = new QPushButton(
00046             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/helpTab.png") ),
00047             "Help Contents (F8)", this, "helpTab::main.helpContentsButton");
00048     main.helpContentsButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00049     connect(main.helpContentsButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(helpContents()));
00050     
00051     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.topLabel, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00052     main.labelLayout->addStretch();
00053     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.helpContentsButton);
00054     
00055     main.content = new QTextBrowser(this, "helpTab::main.content");
00056     main.content->setVScrollBarMode(QScrollView::AlwaysOn);
00057     main.content->mimeSourceFactory()->addFilePath(HELP_PATH);
00058     main.content->setSource("contents.html");
00059     main.content->installEventFilter(this);
00060     
00061     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.content);
00062     
00063     main.bottomLabel = new QLabel(
00064             "<nobr><b>Keyboard Control:</b></nobr><br>"
00065             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Up</b> / <b>Down</b>: Scroll the page</nobr><br>"
00066             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Tab</b> / <b>Shift-Tab</b>: Select a link</nobr>", this,
00067             "helpTab::main.bottomLabel");
00068     
00069     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomLabel);
00070    
00071 }
00072 
00073 void HelpTab::helpContents()
00074 {
00075     main.content->home();
00076 }
00077 
00078 void HelpTab::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00079 {
00080     switch(event->key())
00081     {
00082         case Key_Escape:
00083             emit switchToHome();
00084             break;
00085         case Key_F8:
00086             helpContents();
00087             break;
00088         default:
00089             QWidget::keyPressEvent(event);
00090     }
00091 }
